Uses of Interface
org.xchain.Command

  • Packages that use Command 
    Package Description
    org.xchain
    Provides the classes and interfaces for defining XChains.
    org.xchain.framework.lifecycle
    Provides classes that execute the XChain lifecycle.
    org.xchain.framework.sax  
    org.xchain.impl
    Provides basic implementations of Chain and Filter to use as a base for chain classes.
    org.xchain.namespaces.core
    The base core commands for xchains.
    org.xchain.namespaces.csv  
    org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate
    This namespace provides access to hibernate.
    org.xchain.namespaces.javascript
    This namespace provides commands to serve JavaScript via a servlet container.
    org.xchain.namespaces.jsl
    The xchain jsl command package.
    org.xchain.namespaces.sax
    The xchain sax command package.
    org.xchain.namespaces.servlet
    This namespace provides commands to access data related to the servlet request and response cycle.

    • Uses of Command in org.xchain

      Subinterfaces of Command in org.xchain 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Chain
      The interface for JXPathContext chains.
      interface  EngineeredCommand
      The interface for engineered commands.
      interface  Filter
      The interface for JXPathContext filters.

    • Uses of Command in org.xchain.framework.lifecycle

      Methods in org.xchain.framework.lifecycle with parameters of type Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext Execution.endCommandExecute(Command command, org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext context)
      Executed at the end of a command's execute method if it is not a filter or at the end of a command's postProcess method if it is a filter.
      static org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext Execution.endCommandPostProcess(Command command, org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext context)
      Marks the end of a commands post process method.
      static void Execution.exceptionHandled(Command command, java.lang.Exception exception) 
      static void Execution.exceptionThrown(Command command, java.lang.Exception exception)
      Called by engineered commands to notify that an exception is propagating from an execute(JXPathContext) method.
      static org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext Execution.startCommandExecute(Command command, org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext context)
      Signals that the execute method of a command has been called.
      static org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext Execution.startCommandPostProcess(Command command, org.apache.commons.jxpath.JXPathContext context)
      Resumes the top item on the suspended context stack.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChainImpl
      Almost an exact port of the class org.apache.commons.chain.impl.ChainBase, except the nested chains are represented with a java.util.ArrayList instead of an array.

      Almost an exact port of the class org.apache.commons.chain.impl.ChainBase, except the nested chains are represented with a java.util.ArrayList instead of an array.
      class  FilterChainImpl
      Almost an exact port of the class org.apache.commons.chain.impl.ChainBase, except the nested chains are represented with a java.util.ArrayList instead of an array.
      class  FilterList
      Almost an exact port of the class org.apache.commons.chain.impl.ChainBase, except the nested chains are represented with a java.util.ArrayList instead of an array.

    • Uses of Command in org.xchain.namespaces.core

      Classes in org.xchain.namespaces.core that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ChainCommand
      A general container for xchain commands.
      class  ChooseCommand
      The choose command allows the execution of one chain based on tested conditions.
      static class  ChooseCommand.OtherwiseClause
      choose commands can include an otherwise command.
      static class  ChooseCommand.WhenClause
      choose commands can have one or more when commands nested in it.
      class  DebugMessageCommand 
      class  EvalCommand
      The eval command will evaluate an xpath expression.
      class  ExecuteCommand
      The execute command can execute another command chain.
      class  FilterChainCommand
      A general container for xchain commands.
      class  FilterChooseCommand
      The choose command implemented as a filter.
      static class  FilterChooseCommand.OtherwiseClause
      filter-choose commands can include an otherwise command.
      static class  FilterChooseCommand.WhenClause
      filter-choose commands can have one or more when commands nested in it.
      class  FilterIfCommand
      The if command implemented as a filter.
      class  FilterVariableCommand
      The variable command implemented as a filter.
      class  ForEachCommand
      The for-each will execute its child commands for each element selected by the select attribute.
      class  HandledCommand
      A command that can stop the execution of an xchain by reporting that it handled the request.
      class  IfCommand
      The if command will execute its child commands if the test attribute evaluates to true.
      class  IterateCommand
      The iterate command will execute its child commands for each element in the object selected by the select attribute.
      class  ThrowCommand 
      class  TraceCommand 
      class  VariableCommand
      The variable command will declare and set a variable in the context.
      class  WithCommand
      The with command will execute its child commands with the selected element as the root context.
      Fields in org.xchain.namespaces.core with type parameters of type Command 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static ThreadLocalStack<Command> ExecuteCommand.callStack 
      protected java.util.Map<javax.xml.namespace.QName,Command> XChainCatalog.commandMap
      The map of commands in this catalog.
      protected java.util.LinkedList<java.util.Map<javax.xml.namespace.QName,Command>> XChainCatalog.commandMapList
      A list of all command maps attached to this catalog through import.
      protected CompositeMap<javax.xml.namespace.QName,Command> XChainCatalog.compositeCommandMap
      A composite map that will look values up from the command map list.
      Methods in org.xchain.namespaces.core that return Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Command XChainCatalog.getCommand(javax.xml.namespace.QName name)
      Gets the command for the QName specified, or null if the command was not found.
      Command XChainCatalog.getCommand(java.lang.String name)
      Gets the command for the name specified in the default namespace, or null if the command was not found.
      Methods in org.xchain.namespaces.core that return types with arguments of type Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      void XChainCatalog.addCommand(java.lang.String name, Command command)

    • Uses of Command in org.xchain.namespaces.csv

      Classes in org.xchain.namespaces.csv that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCsvChain
      Base class for CSV chains.
      class  CellCommand
      XChain for populating the next cell in the current row.
      class  CsvWriterChain
      Chain for production of CSV data.
      class  RowChain
      Starts a new row for the CSV.

    • Uses of Command in org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate

      Classes in org.xchain.namespaces.hibernate that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractQueryCommand
      Base query command class.
      class  AbstractQueryResultCommand
      Base query result command.
      class  AbstractSessionCommand
      Base session command class.
      class  DebugSessionCommand 
      class  DeleteCommand
      The delete command deletes the provided entity or list of entities.
      class  FirstResultCommand
      The first-result command sets the FirstResult on the parent Query.
      class  GetCommand
      The get command starts executes the Get method on the current session.
      class  ListCommand
      The list evaluates the Query as a list.
      class  MaxResultCommand
      The max-result command sets the MaxResults on the parent Query.
      class  PersistCommand
      The persist command will execute a Hibernate persist on the session with the specified entity.
      class  QueryCommand
      The query command starts a new query.
      class  SaveCommand
      The save command will execute a Hibernate save on the session with the specified entity.
      class  SessionCommand
      NOTE: The hibernate session command is currently broken.
      class  TransactionCommand
      The transaction command starts a Hibernate transaction.
      class  UniqueResultCommand
      The unique-result evaluates a query as a uniqueResult.
      class  UpdateCommand
      The update executes the query as an update.
      class  ValidateCommand
      The validate command ensures that objects have their proper hibernate restrictions.
      static class  ValidateCommand.InvalidClause
      The invalid command chain is executed if the parent validation command fails.
      static class  ValidateCommand.ValidClause
      The valid command chain is executed if the parent validation command passes.

      Classes in org.xchain.namespaces.javascript that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MergeJavascript
      A basic javascript merging command.

    • Uses of Command in org.xchain.namespaces.jsl

      Classes in org.xchain.namespaces.jsl that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractTemplateCommand
      The base class for generated jsl template commands.
      class  TemporaryCommand
      Almost an exact port of the class org.apache.commons.chain.impl.ChainBase, except the nested chains are represented with a java.util.ArrayList instead of an array.

    • Uses of Command in org.xchain.namespaces.sax

      Classes in org.xchain.namespaces.sax that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommandSourceCommand
      The <sax:command-source/> command is used in a sax pipeline to get source nodes from a command.
      class  CommandSourceCommand.ChildrenCommand 
      class  MultiDocumentResultCommand
      The <sax:multi-document-result/> result adds a MultiDocumentResult element to the sax pipeline.
      class  NullResultCommand
      The <sax:null-result> element creates a sax result that does nothing with the sax events it receives from the pipeline.
      class  OutputPropertyCommand
      <sax:output-property/> elements are placed inside <sax:transfromer/> elements to set output properties on a transformer.
      class  ParameterCommand
      <sax:parameter/> elements are placed inside <sax:transfromer/> elements to set parameters on a transformer.
      class  PipelineCommand
      The <sax:pipeline> command creates a sax pipeline, and then executes it.
      class  ResultCommand
      The <sax:result/> command adds result objects to a pipeline.
      class  SerializerCommand
      The <sax:serializer/> element adds a serialization stage to the pipeline.
      class  TransformerCommand
      The <sax:transformer/> adds a transform to a sax pipeline.
      class  UrlSourceCommand

      class  ForwardCommand 
      class  GetCookie
      Base class to provide simple string value existence and email string validation.
      class  RedirectCommand 
      class  SetCookie
      Base class to provide simple string value existence and email string validation.
